news.title: 'Carspreading' is on the rise - and not everyone is happy about it
news.summary: In the UK and across Europe, cars are becoming longer, wider and heavier

news.title: Cyclone catastrophe in Sri Lanka awakens volunteer spirit
news.summary: Fishing boats deliver relief supplies to flooded suburbs as community kitchens churn out food aid.

news.title: The Papers: 'No justice' over Hillsborough and 'Holly's guilt over crash'
news.summary: Wednesday's front pages focus on the Hillsborough disaster report and the fine given to TV presenter Holly Willoughby for driving without due care.

news.title: Newcastle penalty 'absolute VAR mistake' - Frank
news.summary: Thomas Frank says awarding Newcastle a penalty after a holding incident between Dan Burn and Rodrigo Bentancur was an "absolute mistake" by VAR.

news.title: Eleven and hell - the cost of Newcastle's dropped points
news.summary: Newcastle United have dropped more points from winning positions than any other side in the Premier League this season - the tally now stands at 11 after Tuesday's 2-2 draw with Tottenham.
